Welcome to PlaceToGo Thank you for installing. Prepare to get amazed. Lets Go!!
Challenge Much? Find traditional way of exploring boring? Well, here we have list of challenges for you to take and have an amusing experience with achievement points!!!
Roam Around A lot? Can\'t decide where to eat or go? Give it to us. We will find you the best yet nearest place you want to eat or visit.
Just Say It! Want to move around faster? Well you can use our speech recognition feature to look for a place to go instead of typing it out. Refresh Need recommendation?
Opening Hours Features Reasons Tips CLOSE
Challenge 1 Dinosaurs in the city Well, dinosaurs is always under eye of government but above eyes of public. Check In Challenge 2 I watch the birth and death of kings I last beyond all living things\n I am the oldest in the land\n I am the greatest boulder, the finest sand\n I stand above the Penang \n Up, up it goes and yet never grows? Challenge 3 The Dragon? I once killed the Thunder God, although I was fallen with him.\n My brother consumed the greatest god, while my sister was the ruler of hell.\n I left my posterity under this cruel world, living in the shrine, while they never grows. \n The shrineâ€¦the shrine...... Challenge 4 The Collector I am once the barrier from enemy \n Defending from the assault \n Even I was retired long time ago \n But I never ever forget to deliver the art of fight for my land\n With every part of my body.
